en-US.description:
Make your home or office sound like a vintage arcade from 1981, 1983, 1986, or 1992 using Andy Hofle's (http://arcade.hofle.com) amazing audio arcade ambience recreations!

To invoke Arcade Party, say:

Alexa, open Arcade Party

To start playing arcade sounds, say:

Alexa, ask Arcade Party Demo to play arcade sounds. Use Next and Previous to move through different arcade eras. Say Stop or Pause to pause, and Resume or Start to pick up where you left off.

Many thanks to Archive.org (https://archive.org/), a preservational non-profit that not only hosts this fabulous content, but also provides and maintains a truly historical treasure trove!

__
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Demo Arcade Party to play arcade sounds.
Alexa, ask Demo Arcade Party to play.
en-US.name: Demo Arcade Party: Lambda
en-US.summary: Make your home or office sound like an arcade party!

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: This skill streams arcade sounds from different eras. You can choose an arcade replication from 1981, 1983, 1986, or 1992.
